titles.title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 10/3/2000--Introduced. Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to: (1) extend the time period during which a specified hydroelectric project licensee is required to commence construction in the State of Ohio; and (2) extend, upon request, the period during which such licensee is required to commence project construction for two consecutive two-year periods.Provides for reinstatement of an expired license.
